legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5001_1001_:
The person who saw Ghetsis said he was
around here...

Alder’s also helping us out by searching other
areas. We have to find Ghetsis quickly!
Well, well. Aren’t you working hard today.
Silver! You came?
I was a little curious, that’s all.

Ghetsis is the man who was actually pulling the
strings behind Team Plasma, right? I’d like to see
what he’s like.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5001_0401_:
You seriously tagged along without any idea as to
who we’re dealing with here?
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5001_0302_: So he’s the leader of Team Plasma?
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5001_0402_:
Oh, yeah. I guess we never explained all that
to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5001_1001_: Allow me to shed some light on the situation.

In the past, I was known as the king of Team
Plasma, an organization that called for the
liberation of all Pokémon.

But my title was just for show. The executives of
the organization were its true puppeteers—and
Ghetsis was one of them.

He claimed everything he did was for Pokémon
liberation, but his real goal was to use Pokémon
to control people!

Hilbert and Alder convinced me to leave Team
Plasma...but Ghetsis never gave up his ambitions.

He tried to sow chaos and confusion in Unova
a second time.
A lot of people got hurt because of him!
I’ll never forgive him for what he did!

It’s true... The things he’s done aren’t
easily forgiven.
However...
My word... Do my eyes deceive me?
N! Is it really you?
Ghetsis!
So the rumors were true. You did come to Pasio.

To think that I’d finally see you again here of
all places...
I wasn’t expecting to see you here, either.

But now that I know you’re here, I won’t let you
carry out whatever you’re plotting on Pasio!

(You gotta be kidding me. This guy was the
leader of Team Plasma?)

I...I understand that you may not trust me, but I
have no intention of causing harm.
I simply wish to be a normal Trainer.
What?!
I don’t believe you!

I assure you, it’s the truth. I lost so much. Only
then did I realize the error of my foolish ways.

I no longer have Team Plasma or the Shadow
Triad to do my bidding...

And gone are my former ambitions... All I have
now are regrets. So many regrets...
I was such a fool...
Do you...really regret the things you’ve done?
All I have left...
is this Kyurem.

Now, all I want is to live the quiet life of a
sync pair with this Pokémon.

You honestly think we’re just gonna believe
whatever you say?
I understand...but that is all I can offer you.
Please, believe me...my son...
Son?! N is your son?

We’re not bound by blood...and I have no right
whatsoever to be called a father...

But if I could have the chance to make amends on
this island...
N... Won’t you let me be a true father to you?

I...I don’t think I can give you an answer
right now.

But if you’re not doing anything wrong, I don’t see
a need to apprehend you. Please leave.

...I suppose you’re right. It was too much of me
to ask.
So be it... Farewell.
You sure about this?
Yeah...
(Can I really trust you, Ghetsis?)
(Father?)
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5002_1001_:
N! Why didn’t you capture him right then
and there?
He hasn’t done anything wrong yet.

But you remember everything he did back in
Unova, don’t you?
How could you even think of believing him?!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], what do you think of
what Ghetsis said?
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5002_0402_: I see... That makes sense, I suppose.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5002_1001_: What’s wrong with you, N?

For the former king of Team Plasma, you’re
pretty indecisive.
Huh?

You asked everyone for their opinion because you
can’t make sense of this situation...and even after
all that, you still don’t have an answer.
At least decide for yourself what you want to do!
Silver...

Hold on a second, Silver! Are you saying we
should trust Ghetsis?
Who knows? But let me tell you something...

Don’t assume for one second, Nate, that others
have had the same upbringing as you.
Huh?
Having a guy like that for a father can be rough...
Silver...
He sounds like he’s speaking from experience...

I’m sorry, N. I was too caught up thinking about
all the people that he’s hurt...

I didn’t think about what you must be feeling
right now...
It’s OK. I know you meant well.
Where are you going?

I need to think things over and find the
answer myself...
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5003_1001_:
We’re not blood related...and our ways of
thinking are so different...

What a complicated equation... Even so, I’d like
to find a proper solution to it.
I wonder if there even is an answer to this...
What do you think, Alder?
I see... So Ghetsis said all that.

Perhaps he’s not the Ghetsis that I knew in
the past.

But when he asked to be my father again, I
remembered that team we battled earlier today.
A father and his son, fighting side by side...

It made me wonder if I’d ever have the chance to
battle alongside Ghetsis like that.

I know this may not be what you want to hear,
but I’m going to be completely honest with you.

Given how nefarious Ghetsis is, I think what he
said was a trap.

However, that’s easy for me to say as
an outsider.

I myself have a naughty little grandson. His name
is Benga.
If he ever went down the wrong path...

I don’t think I could say no if he asked me to trust
him afterward.

That’s what a family is. An emotional connection
that defies all logic and reason.
Family...
I must say, you’ve changed a lot.

I think if this had happened to you in the past, you
wouldn’t have spent any time on this decision.

You were stubbornly black and white about your
beliefs back then, after all.

That’s true. I never thought I’d spend so much time
second-guessing myself over one person.
I wonder if that means I’ve become weak.
No. Not at all.
You’ve just become more human, is all.
Human...

Suffering, worrying, and feeling lost are all part
of being human... Overcoming those struggles is
how we grow.

Personally, I prefer the person you’ve become to
the person you were before.

Me, a human? Even though I used to be called a 
freak without a human heart?

Thank you, Alder. I’m glad we were able to have
this talk.
I know what to do now.
Looks like he’s made up his mind.
Wait a second. Are you...crying?

Silver...what you said about N and I having
different upbringings was true.

But I’m still on his side! And I want to help him
find a way to be happy!
I see...
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5004_1001_:
The rift between us is deep. Mending it is no
easy task.

However, I’d like to believe that I’ll be successful
in the end.

Is that so? Then, let’s proceed with the next phase
of our plan.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5005_1001_: You’re sure about this, N?

Yes. It’s the solution I’ve arrived at. I’m sure this
is what I want to do.

Also...thank you—both of you—for coming here
with me.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5005_0301_: It’d be hard to do this alone!
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5005_0401_:
You’re right. Even though I’ve made up my mind, 
I’m still a little worried.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5005_0302_: We can’t let our guard down yet!
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5005_0402_:
Yes... We should be careful when dealing with
a man like him.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5005_1001_: No matter what happens, we’re on your side!
Thank you...
N! You’ve come to see me!
I’ve come to let you know my answer.
First, let’s send out our Pokémon.
Well? What’s your answer?

I don’t think it’s possible for the two of us to
become a true father and son so easily...

But if you’ve really had a change of heart, and
you’re willing to sincerely face people and
Pokémon...then maybe, one day, it will be.

That’s why I need you to show me that you have
love in your heart—through battle!
Father!
I am grateful you’ve given me this opportunity...
Thank you for this chance...
to capture Zekrom for myself!
What?!
Now! Restrain Zekrom!
Zekrom!

*chuckle* It can’t move. I’ve taken special
measures to use Pokémon that can hold it
in place!
What do you think you’re doing, Ghetsis?!
I can’t believe you’d actually do such a thing...
Myah-ha-ha! Of course I would!

I only put on that ridiculous act so I could get my
hands on Zekrom!

As if we could be a true family! Me? With a freak
like you?

What an awful thing to say! How dare you play
with N’s feelings like that!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], help N
protect Zekrom!
Oh? Not bad.
I can feel your anger!
Next is that pair holding down Zekrom!
That’s enough.
Braviary?!
Wait, is that—?
Stay out of my way.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5006_1001_:
Giovanni, the leader of Team Rocket? What are
you doing here?

I happened to meet Ghetsis while I was recruiting
some Team Break members. He told me all about
his plans.

If he’s able to get his hands on Zekrom, that works
out perfectly for me.

Yes, I should thank you for gathering these pawns
and sharing your information with me.
I’ll be sure to return the favor.

I will soon possess a Legendary Pokémon that
combines two powers!
The fusion of Kyurem and Zekrom...

Oh, so you knew about that. I was hoping you’d
be more surprised.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5007_1001_: What do you think you’re doing?
I, too, have a plan in place.

You see, I know how you operate, Ghetsis—a lot
better than you think.

The way I see it, once you have both Legendary
Pokémon in hand, your next move will be to
secure more pawns to command.

Since I’m the one who controls these Team Break
members, you’d come after me next!

So I intend to take Kyurem and Zekrom for myself
before that can happen!

You have more foresight than I thought. What a
cunning man you are.
But it’s too little, too late!

I may not look like it, but you could say I have
a talent for convincing others to join me.

A faction of Team Break is already under
my control!

I see... Perhaps I did underestimate you.
Very well, then...

They’ve broken off their alliance... Well, I suppose
they were never actually allies to begin with.

I want to save Zekrom, but there are too many
Pokémon over there...

I had a feeling something bad would happen...
I’m glad we made it in time!

We took care of the Team Break members at the
entrance, but reinforcements are on the way! We
need to get out of here!

I have more important things to worry about right
now than him...
Zekrom... I’m so glad you’re OK.

Now that a former Champion has come, I suppose
I have no choice but to give up on Zekrom.
Let’s move! We have to go!
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5008_1001_: What are you doing? Just leave him!

I want to save Kyurem, regardless of whose
Pokémon it is.
Even if it means I have to help you.
I won’t call you my father, Ghetsis...
but if you cooperate, I’ll help you get out of this!
Very well! That’s convenient for me!
N and Ghetsis, standing side by side...

Hang in there just a little longer, Braviary! We
have to help N!

It’s too late to stop them. Let’s make sure they
have a safe escape route!
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5009_1001_:
The plan is to hold off Mewtwo until he can’t
come after you anymore, all right?
Well, well. Why don’t we put it to the test, then?

Let’s see what your little father-son team-up
can do!
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5010_1001_: Hmph. This does surpass my expectations.

No! Remember what I said earlier? We’re getting
out of here.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5011_1001_:
Too bad... This would’ve been much easier if you
had just stayed here...

The more people you command, the harder it is
to control them... Learning that much is enough
for today.

Besides...I’m very pleased by what I’ve
seen today.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5012_1001_: I think they’ve stopped coming after us.
I see. Then...

You want to come after me now? I can’t let
that happen.

Perhaps we can agree to a truce for today.
What do you think, N?
I know that you haven’t changed at all.

If you do anything to harm the people and
Pokémon of Pasio, I’ll be the first in line to
stop you!
Hmph. I’ll keep that in mind.
Farewell.
Wait! Ghetsis!

I hate you. I’ll never forget what you did
in Unova.

But you’re still N’s father! You raised him and
spent all those years together!

Are you really going to say you felt nothing when
you two fought side by side earlier?

It’s not too late to change your ways! Please!
Think about it!
Nate...
Ghetsis!
*chuckle*
MYAH-HA-HA-HA! You naive fools!

Our relationship is nothing more than that between
a master and his tools! What happened today
changes nothing!

As long as I can keep using you, I don’t care what
you call our relationship!

I do whatever I please! I’m not your ally or your
friend—and I’m certainly NOT your father!
How dare you—

Despicable... You’re the one without a
heart, Ghetsis.
Myah-ha-ha! Farewell, my precious tools!
I had a bad feeling this might happen.

My apologies, N. Perhaps I should have stopped
you before you rushed to help him.
Please, don’t apologize. It was my decision.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5012_0401_:
Thanks, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. That means
a lot to me.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5012_0402_:
Don’t look so down, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Please don’t be sad on my behalf.
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5012_1001_: Nate...are you crying again?

You truly have a kind heart...one that resonates
with others.

You got angry for the people of Unova, you yelled
at Ghetsis for me...
and now, you’re even crying for me...
I can’t help it! It’s just so messed up!

You’re not asking for anything special! You just
want a normal relationship with the man you call
your father...

It’s not asking for much! Why can’t you have
that, too?
Nate... Really, it’s OK.

I may not have a father, but I have people like
you to call my friends.
Yeah, you can survive without a father...
Yeah...

(I’m blessed to be surrounded by such kind people
and Pokémon...)
(It’s fine... That’s enough for me.)
(I suppose it’s just not meant to be...)
(Even so...it felt nice to hope for it...)
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5301_1001_: Argh! What was that ring of light?
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5302_1001_: It’s a tie... I didn’t expect that to happen.

Hmph! We had two Legendary Pokémon on our
team, but we still tied?

Hahaha! You both did well for a team that was
put together on the spot!

And of course, it’s not always pure strength that
wins the battle.

Thanks for teaming up with me, Dad! It was
super easy to battle with you supporting me!

With all these opportunities for us to team up, I’m
getting used to your style of battling!

I can tell you’ve come a long way and gotten a
lot stronger, Brendan!
Yes, I see what you mean.
N! You have to hear this!
Earlier, someone at the Pokémon Center...

They said they saw Ghetsis! He might be here
on Pasio!
legend_event_pm0646_11_kyurem/5303_1001_: I need your help to find someone.

But we need to be careful. The guy we’re looking
for is very dangerous.

We can head out once you’re ready. Let’s find 
him together!
